mods:titleInfo.mods:title: V. Ray Townsend house (Long Beach, Calif.). Alterations and additions

Alterations & additions to residence, 4260 Magnolia Ave., Long Beach, Calif., for Dr. V. Ray Townsend., Details of case in bedroom 1 -- section thru meeting styles, vertical section thru head, horizontal section thru mullion with cross section, section thru door rails ; elevation of handle, F.S. details of drawers corner and center guides ; diagram showing location of shelf, elevation of drawer separater ; vertical sections thru base -- for drawers, without drawers ; elevation of handles : Sheet no. 12.

mods:mods.mods:note: "Same details apply to cases in bedroom 4 and sittin[g ro]om except doors are battened in bedroom 4 and are panelled in bed[roo]m 1".
Gift of Jean Murray Bangs (Mrs. Harwell Hamilton Harris), 1960; formerly the collection of Charles Sumner Greene.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Greene & Greene architectural records and papers

mods:location.mods:physicalLocation: Avery Architectural & Fine Arts Library, Columbia University
